1140940.name: Games
1140940.description:
September 21, 2019. You wake up slightly dazed from what has just happened. What had just happened? Where are you and what are you doing here? Then it floods back to you, you are INSIDE high security military base. You made it in with your four other friends but, where are they now. It is your job to explore the different areas to find your four other friends before it is too late.

In this top down RPG you explore different areas and rooms to find better weapons and potions to fight against bigger and bigger bosses. Each area has its own unique layout and enemies. As you fight through hoards of monsters such as robots and aliens you level up and become stronger, preparing you for the four unique boss battles at the end of each area.
1140940.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
